name: RAM it!
description:
!Web build now working!

This game turns the concepts of loosing and winning upside down. Try to help a little memory cell making its way to the Nullbyte of the RAM to defend a virus. There are lots of hidden platforms... 

... which are suddenly appearing step by step if you fell off...

It took so much work to do this game and I hope you enjoy. If so I would be glad about some feedback ;)
